Package org.radarbase.management.service.mapper.decorator

Class ClientDetailsMapperDecorator

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.service.mapper.decorator.ClientDetailsMapperDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientDetailsMapper
public abstract class ClientDetailsMapperDecorator extends Object implements ClientDetailsMapper
Decorator for ClientDetailsMapper. The ClientDetails interface does not expose a method to get all auto-approve scopes, instead it only has a method to check if a given scope is auto-approve. This decorator adds the subset of scopes for which isAutoApprove returns true to the DTO.
